short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Modify your Ajax response to test

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Allows you to modify Ajax response data without leaving the browser.

1、Lightweight
2、Support protocol interception
3、Hitting statistics
4、Immediate response without refreshing

1、轻量级
2、支持协议拦截
3、命中率统计
4、无需刷新，即时响应
